title: ECE ELECTIVE experience pls
content:
Hey anyone who took ece elective as 1)digital system design
2)Functional and formal verification of digital design
3)machine intelligence for chip security 
4) artificial neural networks
Can you give your experience how tough was the course, how practical, how was marks given

comments.body: Your question or post has been answered previously. Before making a new post, always remember to search the subreddit. Duplicate posts will entail deletion.
